entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 10:34 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High 6.
entry.summary: Showers. Fog patches. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming north 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 10:34 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to periods of snow in the evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast late in the evening and overnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 10:34 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
